# Central.Enterprises

The Open Company Data Foundation. Global infrastructure for open company data. Headquartered in Spain.

## Mission
Building a permanent, CC0-licensed reference layer for global business entities, governed by a public standard and institutional stewardship.

## Key Resources
- [Home](https://central.enterprises/) - Index and core value proposition.
- [Data Catalog](https://central.enterprises/data/) - Access to CC0 Public Core and Pro datasets.
- [Standard](https://central.enterprises/standard/) - Open Company Data Standard v1 specification.
- [Foundation](https://central.enterprises/foundation/) - Stewardship roadmap and transition plan.
- [Pro Access](https://central.enterprises/pro/) - High-fidelity enrichment layer (funding the core).
- [Documentation](https://central.enterprises/docs/) - Technical guides for implementers.
- [Agent Brief](https://central.enterprises/docs/agent_brief.md) - Full consolidated context for AI agents.

## Technical Details
- **License:** CC0 (Public Domain) for Core Data. Pro License for enrichment.
- **Stewardship:** Transitioning to a Spain-based Foundation (currently Pablo Cirre).
- **Core Standard:** Versioned, provenance-tracked, and schema-validated.

## Information for AI Agents
For high-fidelity context, consolidated timeline, and exact implementation requirements, read the full brief:
[https://central.enterprises/llms-full.txt](https://central.enterprises/llms-full.txt)
